recipe_name: Marinated red snapper with turmeric and coconut rice salad and citrus relish
author: Alex Mackay
method: For the marinated red snapper, place the raw snapper pieces into a bowl and sprinkle with salt. Add the lime and lemon juice and stir. Set aside to marinate for a few minutes. For the rice salad, place all the rice salad ingredients into a bowl and mix well. For the citrus relish, place all the citrus relish ingredients into another bowl and mix well. To serve, place the tomato slices onto a serving plate. Top with the rice salad, citrus relish and marinated snapper and drizzle over the marinade.
ingredients: 1 fillet red snapper, skinned and sliced into very thin strips,  1 tsp salt,  1 lime, juice only,  1 lemon, juice only,  100g/3½oz rice, cooked according to packet instructions and cooled,  1 tsp ground turmeric,  2 tbsp coconut milk,  small handful fresh basil, chopped,  small handful fresh mint, chopped ,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 lemon, juice only,  1 lime, zest only,  1 tbsp olive oil,  small piece fresh coconut, chopped flesh only,  1 tomato, seeds removed and sliced,  1 orange, peeled and chopped,  1 tbsp coconut milk,  small handful fresh flatleaf parsley, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tomato, sliced, to serve
